Crashing Report CrashTest has crashed An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK. You might add your comments about the problem below: Thank you ! Your Email ! Would you like to upload some files too? Perhaps a Youtube video? Fill in the details below and click Add. If you are only adding some information then just click Add.
Deep Link: %s Invitation ID: %s

OK Files Folders Go Up Check All Cancel Uncheck All External Internal New Foldern Enter New Folder Name Create http://www.swopinfo.com/subscriptions_app.aspx This account gives you all of the features from SwopInfo - Business Lite, plus it gives you the support of SwopInfo to help market your company and advertise your products and services. > SwopInfo Individual Profile.\n> Upload Pictures, documents, video links, PDF, WORD, EXCEL, PPT.\n> Company Members\n> Digital Business Cards\n> Centralized Digital Remarketing of your Business onto Social Media.\n> Facebook Advertising of your business profile for 14 days (R 500 Value)
Article URL: %s Article Title: %s Article Details: %s Thank you for giving us your valuable feedback. It helps us to improve our \nplatform. * SwopInfo Checkin Delivers You Real Time Promotions \n * All you have to do is select your categories that interest you \n * Confirm your favorites and you are on your way to receiving promotions in your specific area/store/mall \n * You can change these favorites at any time to suit your needs \n * Scroll up and down, click on the promotions and should they have more than one page swipe left or right, Thats it \n * Share these promotions to friends/family and colleagues using our share button and in app chat.
